document_data.name: Anglond Obarskyr
document_data.parents: [[Arathra Obarskyr]]|spouses = [[Eleriel Obarskyr|Eleriel]]|siblings = [[Andilber Obarskyr]]|children = [[Azoun Obarskyr I]]|dynasty = [[Obarskyr|Obarskyr Dynasty]]|start of reign = [[370 DR]]|end of reign = [[391 DR]]|predecessor = [[Andilber Obarskyr|Andilber the Unfortunate]]|successor = [[Azoun I]]}}
document_data.mainbody: 'King Anglond Obarskyr''' was the 50{{th}} monarch of [[Cormyr]], reigning from [[370 DR|370]] to [[391 DR]].
document_data.Relatives: Anglond was the second son of [[Arathra Obarskyr]]. He married [[Eleriel Obarskyr|Eleriel]] and his only son would become [[Azoun I]].
